verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
Thou art worthy, Thou Art worthy,
Thou art worthy, O Lord
Thou art worthy, To receive glory,
Glory and honor and power,

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
For Thou hast created,
Hast all things created
For Thou hast created All things,
And for Thy pleasure
They are created
Thou art worthy, O Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou art worthy, Thou art worthy
Thou art worthy, O Lord.
Thou art worthy, To receive glory,
Glory and honor and power.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Because Thou wast slain
And Thy blood has Redeemed us
From every nation and tongue,
And Thou hast made us,
Both kings and priests,
Thou art worthy, O Lord.
